===Noun===

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} a military rank; [[captain]]

===Usage notes===
Created in the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]], this rank was somewhere just below the rank of [[general]]. By the [[w:Tang Dynasty|Tang Dynasty]], the rank had become more of a middle level rank.
